Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ụka nne bụ emume ndị ụka Katọlik ji akwanyere ndị nne ugwu n'ụzọ pụrụ iche
Mmemme ncheta ụbọchị ndị Nne na-ekpo ọkụ tata n'ụka Katọlik n'Nigeria.
Ụkọchukwu na-elekọta St Michaels Parish Asata Enugwu bụ Fada Callistus Anih toro ndị Nne dịka ihe nke ezinaụlọ ha were gwa ha ka ha nọrọ chukwu nso oge ọbụla ka ụmụ ha ghara ịgahie ụzọ.
Ụka nne ndị Katọlik akpọtụrụ akpọtụ
Fada Anih Kwuputara nke a n'ozioma ụka ọkara maka ndị nne tata.
E jiri ọtụtụ ụzọ sị ọṅụ na mmeme ndị nne
Ojikwa ohere ahụ rịọ ndị Nna na ụmụaka ka ha na-enye ndị nne nkwado n'ezinaụlọ ma na-enye ha ugwu kwesiri ekwesi.
Ndị nne yi uwe ejirimara ndị nne ụka katọlik were na-enwe aṅụrị n'uju tata.
Chimamanda bụ onye odeakwụkwọ a ma ama na mbaụwa
